definitions.body: :Pr 17:11 rebellion;—[[מְרִי]] Is 30:9 + 10 t.; [[מֶָרִי]] Nu 17:25 + 9 t.; sf. [[מֶרְיְְ]] De 31:27; [[מִרְיׇם]] Ne 9:17; —rebellion De 31:27, 1Sa 15:23, Ne 9:17, Job 23:2 [[עם]] [[מרי]] rebellious people Is 30:9; [[מרי]]([[ה]])[[בית ]] rebellious house (referring to Israel) Ez Eze 2:5, Eze 2:6, Eze 2:8, Eze 3:9, Eze 3:26, Eze 3:27, Eze 12:2, Eze 12:2, Eze 12:3, Eze 12:9, Eze 12:25, Eze 17:12, Eze 24:3, [[בית]] omitted (restored by Co) Eze 2:7, Eze 44:6; [[בְּנֵי מרי]] rebellious sons Nu 17:25 (P); with omission of [[בֵּן]] (or abstr. for concrete), [[תהי]] [[מֶָרִיאל]] be not a rebellious person Ez Eze 2:8; [[אך מרי יבקּשׁ]] [[רע]] a rebellious man seeketh only evil Pr 17:11.
